text:
Giulio Brogi (3 May 1935 – 19 February 2019) was an Italian actor. He has appeared in 39 movies and television shows since 1967. He starred in the 1974 movie "Morel's Invention", which also starred Anna Karina. He was born in Verona, Veneto, Italy.
Brogi died on 19 February 2019 in Negrar, Italy at the age of 83.
